title: Game Still in Progress...
body: I was playing a game of lol when a java update pulled me out of the game. Now all the screen says is "Game Still in Progress...". The window looks like the start up menu, but it does not allow me to do anything. Please help me

replies.body: Unless the game is still going on and with a reconnect button, It sounds like a ghost game, which can happen when match isn't communicating to the server that it ended.  This can fix on it's own over time, but a relog can help too.  Hang tight!

this happened to me today. I was not given a reconnect button.  I logged in and out multiple times, only to see "game is still in progress". My game was still not launching on its own.

I checked to see if it was a ghost game, but the match showed up on my history as a 3:15 long game with players buying items. I am fixing my client but this has never happened to me before.
